CustomField.description: GTMS-28936 | Controls whether AE influence confirmation is required at opportunity close for this Partner Program. If enabled, the AE is prompted to confirm influence on CRs. If disabled, the confirmation is skipped and CR status is set to "Not Applicable"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Controls whether AE influence confirmation is required at opportunity close for this Partner Program. If enabled, the AE is prompted to confirm influence on CRs. If disabled, the confirmation is skipped and CR status is set to "Not Applicable"
CustomField.label: AE Influence Confirmation Required?
